author: gpetruc
body:
Two items were on by default independently of the era, but they're not available in 2018:
 * e/gamma scale and smearing (don't exist for 2018 prompt reco data)
 * 2015 training of tau ID (2018 has only the 2017v2 training)

This PR changes them to be active only on 94X eras.

@arizzi @steggema @Sam-Harper @lsoffi @roger-wolf @isobelojalvo @mbluj @fabozzi
title: Fix nanoAOD default config for 2018 (without era)
